Legal Policy

Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you visit our website.

Data Collection

We do not actively collect personal data from visitors to our site except for the data you provide via the contact form, such as your name and email address.

Use of Data

We use the data you provide to respond to your inquiries. We do not share your data with third parties, and we do not use it for marketing purposes.

Data Retention

Your data will only be kept for as long as necessary to respond to your inquiry. We will not retain your data beyond this period unless legally required.

Your Rights

You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

Data Security

We take appropriate measures to protect your personal data, but no website or Internet transmission is completely secure.

Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your privacy, please contact us at info@daanboertien.com.

Cookie Policy

This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website.

Types of Cookies

We use only functional cookies that are essential for the proper functioning of the website. We do not use any tracking or marketing cookies.

Managing Cookies

You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect your ability to use some features of this site.
